mapper.update: update t_acct_template set tplname = #{tplname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_book_type = #{accountBookType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accttype = #{accttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acctnamepfx = #{acctnamepfx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acctnameafx = #{acctnameafx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acctnameformula = #{acctnameformula,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, forcefx = #{forcefx,jdbcType=TINYINT}, acctstatus = #{acctstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemcode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, allowpay = #{allowpay,jdbcType=TINYINT}, allowrecharge = #{allowrecharge,jdbcType=TINYINT}, allowdeposit = #{allowdeposit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, allowtfin = #{allowtfin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, allowtfout = #{allowtfout,jdbcType=TINYINT}, allowin = #{allowin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, allowout = #{allowout,jdbcType=TINYINT}, overdramamt = #{overdramamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, drmaxamt = #{drmaxamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, crmaxamt = #{crmaxamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, drdtmaxamt = #{drdtmaxamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, drdtmaxcnt = #{drdtmaxcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, drmtmaxamt = #{drmtmaxamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, drmtmaxcnt = #{drmtmaxcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, crdtmaxamt = #{crdtmaxamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, crdtmaxcnt = #{crdtmaxcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, crmtmaxamt = #{crmtmaxamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, crmtmaxcnt = #{crmtmaxcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, reglimitcusswitch = #{reglimitcusswitch,jdbcType=BIT}, reglimitcaswitch = #{reglimitcaswitch,jdbcType=BIT}, octype = #{octype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tplid = #{tplid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select tplid, tplname, account_book_type, accttype, acctnamepfx, acctnameafx, acctnameformula, forcefx, acctstatus, itemcode, allowpay, allowrecharge, allowdeposit, allowtfin, allowtfout, allowin, allowout, overdramamt, drmaxamt, crmaxamt, drdtmaxamt, drdtmaxcnt, drmtmaxamt, drmtmaxcnt, crdtmaxamt, crdtmaxcnt, crmtmaxamt, crmtmaxcnt, reglimitcusswitch, reglimitcaswitch, octype from t_acct_template
